name: part_018
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン卒業LIVE】最大の感謝を込めて。【MurasakiShion Graduation LIVE】 [4RYbmR8oJHw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_018.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion performs her final song, 'Forget-Me-Not', during her graduation live.
Murasaki Shion gives her final farewell message to her fans through tears.
Ending movie showing Murasaki Shion flying through various scenes, concluding her journey.

subtitles.original: 私を忘れて
subtitles.english: Forget me

subtitles.original: 連れて すぐに
subtitles.english: Take me away, quickly

subtitles.original: 伝えたい想いを声に出したって
subtitles.english: Even if I were to voice the feelings I want to convey,

subtitles.original: こんな言葉なんて言えないんだろう
subtitles.english: I probably couldn't say such words.

subtitles.original: 大事に思ってしまうからずっと
subtitles.english: Because I treasure them so much, I've always

subtitles.original: 大事なことが伝わらないんじゃないかって
subtitles.english: worried that the most important things wouldn't get across.

subtitles.original: 知らない
subtitles.english: I don't know,

subtitles.original: 知らない
subtitles.english: I don't know.

subtitles.original: 知りたくもないことばっかで 胸が裂けていく
subtitles.english: With so many things I don't even want to know, my heart is tearing apart.

subtitles.original: ズタズタになって 痛いくらいに 愛しくなっていく
subtitles.english: Being torn to shreds, it starts to hurt as I love you even more.

subtitles.original: 手も触れないまま 不確かにしてしまう
subtitles.english: Leaving it uncertain, without even being able to touch your hand.

subtitles.original: ごめんね ごめんね
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: いつか 時間が経ってみたら
subtitles.english: If some time passes,

subtitles.original: なんでもないって顔をして
subtitles.english: I'll put on a face as if it's nothing.

subtitles.original: 寂しさも 痛みすらも 抜け落ちて過去になる
subtitles.english: Both the loneliness and even the pain will fall away and become the past.

subtitles.original: いつしかそんな日が来たら そんな時が来るなら
subtitles.english: If such a day comes eventually, if such a time comes,

subtitles.original: だったら今は
subtitles.english: then for now...

subtitles.original: どうしようもないくらいに 君を想っている
subtitles.english: I'm thinking of you so much that I can't help it.

subtitles.original: 思い出になんて ならないくらい 君で出来ている
subtitles.english: So much that it won't even become a memory, I'm made of you.

subtitles.original: ずっと気づいてた 気づいてしまったんだ
subtitles.english: I've always known, I've finally realized it.

subtitles.original: 「忘れて」なんてね
subtitles.english: To say "forget me"...

subtitles.original: 嘘だ
subtitles.english: ...was a lie.

subtitles.original: 愛しさが 胸を焦がしていく
subtitles.english: This love is burning my heart.

subtitles.original: 傷になったって 覚えていて 忘れないでいて
subtitles.english: Even if it becomes a scar, please remember, please don't forget.

subtitles.original: もう言えないから 今、愛を伝う
subtitles.english: Because I can't say it anymore, I'll convey my love now.

subtitles.original: 笑って また会おう
subtitles.english: Let's meet again with a smile.

subtitles.original: さようなら
subtitles.english: Goodbye.

subtitles.original: さようなら
subtitles.english: Goodbye.

subtitles.original: みんな本当に、本当に、めっちゃ大好きだ。
subtitles.english: Everyone, really, really, I love you so much.

subtitles.original: 最後まで見てくれて本当にありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for watching until the very end.

subtitles.original: この6年半、約7年、応援してくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you for supporting me for these six and a half years, nearly seven years.

subtitles.original: ずっと見てくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you for always watching.

subtitles.original: ずっと愛してくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you for always loving me.

subtitles.original: バイバイ！またね！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye! See you again!
